title: British pound set for biggest rising streak in more than three decades
text:
British pound set for biggest rising streak in more than three decades

Forex 4 hours ago (Oct 17, 2019 15:35)

© Reuters. British pound set for biggest rising streak in more than three decades LONDON, Oct 17 (Reuters) - The British pound jumped more than a percent against the dollar on Thursday after Britain clinched a Brexit deal with the European Union. has gained six percent against the dollar over the last six trading sessions , its biggest rising streak since October 1985, according to Refinitiv data.

British pound set for biggest rising streak in more than three decades
description: British pound set for biggest rising streak in more than three decades
